content:
A fundamental requirement is the availability of wxWidgets for iOS. At present

wxiOS is far from a full supported port, but can be used as base for simple applications and future improvements.

It is likely that it is not yet usable for OpenCPN, but this situation is likely to improve.
I have not tried it.

Applications can be built with xcode or with configure/make.
xcode provides an environment for running an iOS/iPadOS app in simulation mode on MacOS. This is obviously the way to test and debug.
